Method.name: TesttopicBegin
Method.Implementation:
#define TopicTableBegin "<!--begin topicstable-->" #define TopicTableEnd "<!--end topicstable-->" #define TopicBegin "<tr"
s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists( 1234, .tmpId ) if status = 1 { d ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( tmpId ) k status, tmpId } s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists( 12345, .tmpId ) if status = 1 { d ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( tmpId ) k status, tmpId } s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists( 123456, .tmpId ) if status = 1 { d ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( tmpId ) k status, tmpId }
s xdataID = "test.Forum.TopicsPage||TopicPageWith3TopicsAnd67Pages" s compiledXdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId(xdataID) s tStream = compiledXdata.Data
//Created object is object of class Forum.TopicsLoader to able to save object and then check it s page = ##class(Forum.TopicsLoader).%New() s page.Forum = "cache" if '##class(Forum.Forum).NameExists( page.Forum, .forumId ){ &sql( Insert Into Forum.Forum (Name) Values ( :page.Forum )) if SQLCODE=0 s forumId=%ROWID Q 1 s forumNotExist = 1 } s page.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( "www.sql.ru" ) s page.request.Data = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() s sc = page.request.Data.CopyFrom( tStream ) s page.pos = 0, page.row = 0, posForMethod = 0 , posOldProp = page.pos, rowOldProp = page.row
s pos = tStream.FindAt( 1, $$$TopicTableBegin ) s pos = pos + $l($$$TopicTableBegin) s end = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicTableEnd ) s pos = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicBegin )
#; 1 pos < end Pre-table header(Pre-pre-topics area)
s sc = page.topicBegin( pos ) do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.pos,posOldProp,"1.Property ""pos"" have to change") do $$$AssertEquals(page.row,rowOldProp,"1.Property ""row"" don't have to change") s pos = pos + $l($$$TopicBegin) s pos = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicBegin ) s posOldProp = page.pos
#; 2 pos < end Table header(Pre-topics area)
s sc = page.topicBegin( pos ) do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.pos,posOldProp,"2.Property ""pos"" have to change") do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.row,rowOldProp,"2.Property ""row"" have to change") s pos = pos + $l($$$TopicBegin) s pos = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicBegin ) s posOldProp = page.pos, rowOldProp = page.row
#; 3 pos < end The first topic
s sc = page.topicBegin( pos ) do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.pos,posOldProp,"3.Property ""pos"" have to change") do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.row,rowOldProp,"3.Property ""row"" have to change") s pos = pos + $l($$$TopicBegin) s pos = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicBegin ) s posOldProp = page.pos, rowOldProp = page.row
#; 4 pos < end The second topic
s sc = page.topicBegin( pos ) do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.pos,posOldProp,"4.Property ""pos"" have to change") do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.row,rowOldProp,"4.Property ""row"" have to change") s pos = pos + $l($$$TopicBegin) s pos = tStream.FindAt( pos, $$$TopicBegin ) s posOldProp = page.pos, rowOldProp = page.row
#; 5 pos > end, page.pos < end The third topic
s sc = page.topicBegin( end ) do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.pos,posOldProp,"5.Property ""pos"" have to change") do $$$AssertNotEquals(page.row,rowOldProp,"5.Property ""row"" have to change")
#; 6 pos > end, page.pos > end
s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists(1234, .topicObjIdFirst) do $$$AssertTrue(status,"Existence of the first topic object") s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists(12345, .topicObjIdSecond) do $$$AssertTrue(status,"Existence of the second topic object") s status = ##class(Forum.Topic).ExtIdExists(123456, .topicObjIdThird) do $$$AssertTrue(status,"Existence of the third topic object")
s st = ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( .topicObjIdFirst ) do $$$AssertTrue(st,"Delete created object") s st = ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( .topicObjIdSecond ) do $$$AssertTrue(st,"Delete created object") s st = ##class(Forum.Topic).%DeleteId( .topicObjIdThird ) do $$$AssertTrue(st,"Delete created object") if $g(forumNotExist)'="" { s st = ##class(Forum.Forum).%DeleteId( .forumId ) do $$$AssertTrue(st,"Delete created object") }

Method.name: TestParse
TestPages
Method.Implementation:
s xdataID = "test.Forum.TopicsPage||TopicPageWith3TopicsAnd67Pages" s compiledXdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId(xdataID) s tStream = compiledXdata.Data
s page = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).%New() s page.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( "www.sql.ru" ) s page.request.Data = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() s sc = page.request.Data.CopyFrom( tStream )
s pages = page.Pages()
do $$$AssertEquals(pages,67,"Testing amount pages")
k page,pages

Method.name: TestUrl
Method.Implementation:
s topicsPageObj = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).%New() s topicsPageObj.Forum = "TestForum" s topicsPageObj.Num = "TestNum"
s url = topicsPageObj.Url()
do $$$AssertEquals(url,"/forum/TestForum/TestNum","Creating url")
k topicsPageObj,url

Method.name: TestGet
Method.Implementation:
s page = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).%New() s page.Forum = "Old Forum" s page.Num = "Old Num"
s page.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( "www.sql.ru" )
s sc = page.Get("New Forum","New Num")
do $$$AssertEquals(page.Forum,"New Forum","Property ""Forum""") do $$$AssertEquals(page.Num,"New Num","Property ""Num""")
s sc = page.Get("cache",1)
s strByMethod = page.request.Data.Read() #; k page
s page = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).%New()
s page.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( "www.sql.ru" ) s page.request.Data = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() s sc = page.request.request.Get( "/forum/cache/1", 0, 1 ) s sc = page.request.Data.CopyFrom( page.request.request.HttpResponse.Data ) #; s strByManually = page.request.Data.Read()
do $$$AssertEquals(strByMethod,strByManually,"Compare srtings of html")
k page,strByManually,strByMethod

Method.name: TestGetPage
Method.Implementation:
s page = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).GetPage( "testCache", 12345, .sc )
do $$$AssertEquals(page.Forum,"testCache","Property ""Forum""") do $$$AssertEquals(page.Num,12345,"Property ""Num""")
k page
s pageByMethod = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).GetPage( "cache", 1, .sc )
#; s pageByManually = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).%New("cache", 1) s pageByManually.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( "www.sql.ru" ) s pageByManually.request.Data = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() s sc = pageByManually.request.request.Get( "/forum/cache/1", 0, 1 ) s sc = pageByManually.request.Data.CopyFrom( pageByManually.request.request.HttpResponse.Data ) #;
s strByMethod = pageByMethod.request.Data.Read() s strByManually = pageByManually.request.Data.Read()
do $$$AssertEquals(strByMethod,strByManually,"Compare srtings of html")
k pageByManually,pageByMethod,strByManually,strByMethod

Method.name: TestGetPages
Method.Implementation:
s xdataID = "test.Forum.TopicsPage||TopicPageWith3TopicsAnd67Pages" s compiledXdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId(xdataID) s tStream = compiledXdata.Data
s pages = ##class(Forum.TopicsPage).GetPages( tStream ) do $$$AssertEquals(pages,67,"Should extract pages count")

Method.name: TestParseMethods
Method.Implementation:
#define TP ##class(Forum.TopicsPage)
s xdataID = "test.Forum.TopicsPage||TopicWithMarkAndAuthorLinkAndWithAPages" s compiledXdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId(xdataID) s topic = compiledXdata.Data s topicW = topic.Read()
s xdataID = "test.Forum.TopicsPage||TopicWithoutMarkAndAuthoLinkAndWith17Pages" s compiledXdata = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId(xdataID) s topic = compiledXdata.Data s topicWO = topic.Read()
s topicW( "Mark" ) = $$$TP.ParseMark( topicW ) ;"Важно: " s topicWO( "Mark" ) = $$$TP.ParseMark( topicWO ) ;""
s topicW( "ExtId" ) = $$$TP.ParseExtId( topicW ) ;1003258 s topicWO( "ExtId" ) = $$$TP.ParseExtId( topicWO ) ;349188 s topicW( "Views" ) = $$$TP.ParseViews( topicW ) ;7599 s topicW( "Answers" ) = $$$TP.ParseAnswers( topicW ) ;12 s topicW( "Updated" ) = $$$TP.ParseUpdated( topicW ) ;7 сен 15, 12:59 s topicW( "Type" ) = $$$TP.ParseType( topicW ) ;"message" s topicW( "Name" ) = $$$TP.ParseName( topicW ) ;"Взаимодействие с InterSystems"
s sc = $$$TP.ParseAuthor( topicW, .author ) m topicW( "Author") = author ; topicW( "Author" ) = "Шваров Евгений", topicW( "Author", "ExtId" ) = 164999 k author s sc = $$$TP.ParseAuthor( topicWO, .author ) m topicWO( "Author") = author ; topicWO( "Author" ) = "Sergey Gladilin" k author
s topicW( "PagesAmount" ) = "a" if $f(topicW,"<!--begin case_ismultipage-->") { s topicW( "PagesAmount" ) = $$$TP.ParsePagesAmount( topicW , topicW("ExtId")) ;"a" } s topicWO( "PagesAmount" ) = "a" if $f(topicWO,"<!--begin case_ismultipage-->") { s topicWO( "PagesAmount" ) = $$$TP.ParsePagesAmount( topicWO , topicWO("ExtId")) ;17 }
do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Mark" ),"Важно:","Should extract mark of name of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicWO( "Mark" ),"","Should extract mark of name of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "ExtId" ),1003258,"Should extract ExtId of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicWO( "ExtId" ),349188,"Should extract ExtId of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Views" ),7599,"Should extract number of views of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Answers" ),12,"Should extract number of answers of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Updated" ),$zdt("63802,46740",3),"Should extract date of last update of topic") ;$zdt("63802,46740",3)=2015-09-07 12:59:00 do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Type" ),"message","Should extract mark of name of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Name" ),"Взаимодействие с InterSystems","Should extract name of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Author" ), "Шваров Евгений","Should extract author of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "Author", "ExtId" ), 164999,"Should extract ExtId of author of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicWO( "Author" ), "Sergey Gladilin","Should extract author of topic") do $$$AssertNotTrue($d(topicWO( "Author", "ExtId" )),"Shouldn't extract ExtId of author of topic") do $$$AssertEquals(topicW( "PagesAmount" ), "a","Should extract amount of pages of topic = ""a""") do $$$AssertEquals(topicWO( "PagesAmount" ), 17,"Should extract amount of pages of topic = 17")
